definition: to help/to do a favor/(Shanghainese) Come on!/Give me a break!
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
to help/to assist/to support/for sb (i.e. as a help)/hired (as worker)/side (of pail, boat etc)/outer layer/upper (of a shoe)/group/gang/clique/party/secret society
busy/hurriedly/to hurry/to rush

sentences.english: Should we get out and help?
Couldn"t you do me a favor and leave me alone?"
sentences.chinese: 能幫幫忙別留下我獨自一人嗎？

sentences.english: My car's engine died at the beltway, can you help me ?
sentences.chinese: 我的車在環城路上死火了，你能幫幫忙嗎？

sentences.english: You can do something for me later.
sentences.chinese: 你可以等以後，給我幫幫忙就行。

sentences.english: Have you received the mooncakes sended at 30th.
sentences.chinese: 麻煩大家了，幫幫忙30號送你的月餅收到了嗎？

sentences.english: Stop fucking around and come and help.
sentences.chinese: 別瞎胡鬧了，過來幫幫忙。

sentences.english: and I always helped out in her classroom.
sentences.chinese: 而且我總在她的課堂上幫幫忙。

sentences.english: Jim can't get down from the tree. Can you help him?
sentences.chinese: 吉姆從樹上下不來了。你能幫幫忙嗎？

sentences.english: Stop messing about and come and help!
I was going to ask him to lend me a hand when he came just in time.
sentences.chinese: 我正想找他來幫幫忙，可好他來了。

sentences.english: Oh, I am a little cold, can you help me ? Would you please lend me a coat ? (
sentences.chinese: 哦，我有點冷，你能幫幫忙，借我一件衣服穿嗎？

sentences.english: Give full archive with all libraries, without them, the application does not start …
sentences.chinese: 這麼強大的地方，難道就沒有高手肯出來幫幫忙嗎？

omnipotent/all-purpose/universal

subordinates in gang of bandits
pedophile (slang, referring to the case of a Hong Kong child abductor who lured girls with the prospect of seeing "goldfish" in his apartment)
to join in the fun/to get in on the action/(fig.) to butt in/to create more trouble
expert/person who takes things philosophically
to pass by or through
reliable/reasonable/probable
modal particle indicating indicating lack of enthusiasm/modal particle indicating that things should only or can only be done a certain way
to chant/see 梵唄|梵呗[fan4 bai4]
hard to say/unpleasant to say/can't be sure
junior or younger male schoolmate
unable to help however much one would like to (idiom); Although we sympathize, there is no way to help you./My hands are tied.
to come in
congratulatory telegram
